execution_quality: The agent made reasonable diagnostic steps but may have missed the actual root cause. The user's follow-up suggests the problem was simpler (frontmatter formatting) than the investigation pursued.
work_category: Debugging skill loading issues by investigating configuration and documentation. Agent explored the project structure, checked documentation, and attempted to identify why skills weren't loading.
summary: Agent investigated skill loading issues through various diagnostic approaches but didn't identify the likely frontmatter problem that the user suspected. The user's follow-up indicates the initial investigation missed the actual issue and redirected the agent toward better documentation reading, suggesting moderate misalignment with what would have been most helpful.
follow_up_pattern: User provided a correction and asked agent to read more thorough documentation about skill structure, suggesting they want a more informed second attempt.
